backend/main.mo: Defines core actor logic including user profiles, shops, shop updates, notifications, storage mixins, and automatic expiration of outdated shop updates.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration upgrading shop updates by adding an expiredAt field while preserving all other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files, mainly describing hooks, pages, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions using OKLCH tokens for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, protected routing, and root layout with MobileAppShell for authenticated views.
frontend/src/BUZZ_DESIGN_SYSTEM.md: Documentation outlining the LocalBuzz design system principles, colors, components, and layout guidelines.
frontend/src/components/AppBackButton.ts: Reusable back button component using app back-navigation hook and a styled button with an arrow icon.
frontend/src/components/LocationStatusCa: UI card that displays location permission state, errors, coordinates, and actions to request or refresh location.
frontend/src/components/MobileAppShell.t: Provides the mobile app layout with header, navigation, logout handling, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/OtpLoginCard.tsx: Phone-based OTP login flow with phone input, OTP input, request/resend logic, verification, and demo OTP copy support.
frontend/src/components/ShopOpenClosedTo: Two-button toggle for marking a shop as open or closed.
frontend/src/components/ShopUpdatePostCa: Card showing a shop update with title, description, image, distance, expiry info, and optional favorite button.
frontend/src/constants/shopCategories.ts: Defines the canonical list of shop categories and its type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
Provides safe back navigation with fallback routes based on authentication state.
React Query hooks to fetch, favorite, unfavorite shops, and check if a shop is favorited.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerHomeFeed.t: Fetches customer feed updates, computes distances, sorts them, and filters by category.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteShopNotifi: Fetches and filters feed updates to find favorited shop notifications beyond 3km but within 10km based on user location.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocationPermission: Manages geolocation permission state and retrieves coordinates with error handling and permission change tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPermis: Tracks browser notification permission status and provides a method to request permission.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpChallenge.ts: Provides mutations to request an OTP challenge and verify OTP codes via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpSession.ts: Stores and manages OTP verification state and phone number in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistLastKnownLo: Persists the user's latest coordinates to the backend when identity is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines shared queries and mutations for user profiles, locations, notifications, and related backend interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useShop.ts: Provides queries and mutations for shop retrieval, registration, updates, and status changes tied to the authenticated owner.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopUpdateNotifica: Consumes queued shop update notifications, shows browser alerts, dedupes them, and acknowledges them to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopUpdates.ts: Provides react-query hooks to fetch, create, update, and delete shop updates using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, global styles, and custom scrollbar utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
Displays customer feed with location-based shop updates, filtering, notifications, and favorites integration.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerProfilePage.t: Shows customer profile with list of favorite shops and allows removing favorites.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles login via Internet Identity and OTP verification before navigating to role selection.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectionPage.tsx: Handles user role selection, persists choice in localStorage, saves profile, and redirects based on selected or stored role.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDashboardPage.tsx: Displays the shop owner dashboard with shop info, update posting, and open/closed status controls.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPostUpdatePage.ts: Provides a form for shop owners to create updates with text, images, and expiry settings.
Allows users to register or edit a shop with details, location, and an optional image.
Shows detailed information for a specific shop update, including image, status, and shop info.
frontend/src/utils/geo.ts: Contains geospatial helpers for distance calculations, formatting, and radius checks.
frontend/src/utils/notificationStorage.t: LocalStorage helpers for notification opt-in state, timestamps, deduped IDs, and legacy per-shop daily counters.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumber.ts: Validates and normalizes Indian phone numbers to +91 format and formats them for display.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Converts between JS dates and nanosecond timestamps and provides helpers for expiry checks and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind setup with custom colors, radius, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing automatic expiry of ShopUpdates via scheduled backend jobs and related requirements.
